name: Blue Knight Versus The Squidgables
description:
I was inspired by Ghost 'n' Goblins, Ghouls and Ghosts on the arcades and 16 bit systems.   Endless Runners on mobile phones.  Zoot and The Mankins on the Sinclair Spectrum,  Frack on the  BBC micro.  Ozone on the Atari ST.  A love of pixel art/cartoons/comic books.

Also a general interest in history and historical fantasy.

King Arthur, Sir Lance-a-Lot and the Knights of the round table.

This is the Windows PC prototype for my second game, after a long break.  I have a feeling this one could be pretty flipping good.  But I'm gonna need plenty of constructive feedback from you retro gamers out there!

Keyboard controls.

Left and right cursor Keys to move.

Up arrow to Jump.

Space bar to throw Lance.

Unzip the zip file.  Open the folder. Click the executable file then bish-bash-bosh and you're away.

I have provided some gameplay footage from an earlier version of the game.  Trailer coming soon.
